summary: Completed testing of SPX admin interface improvements. Found critical access and backend API issues that prevent full testing of Russian interface updates.

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: 1) Fix backend API issues - Constitution, Governance, and Backtest endpoints returning 520 errors. 2) Fix admin authentication - 'clone' error preventing login. 3) Ensure SPX admin tabs are accessible from main interface or provide proper navigation. Only Regimes APIs are working; Constitution and Governance features completely inaccessible due to server errors.
